## image\_get\_type() function

The function "imageGetType" takes a filename as input and returns the file type of the image.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function image_get_type(filename: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filename | string | The filename parameter is a string that represents the name of an image file. |

**Returns:**

string
